definitions.text: showing the cunning or ingenuity or wickedness typical of a devil
examples: the cold calculation and diabolic art of some statesmen
the diabolical expression on his face
a mephistophelian glint in his eye

definitions.text: extremely evil or cruel; expressive of cruelty or befitting hell
examples: something demonic in him--something that could be cruel
fires lit up a diabolic scene
diabolical sorcerers under the influence of devils
